entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
